original_title: The Invisible Life of Addie Larue
overview: A film based on the novel of the same name. Follows a woman who makes a Faustian bargain to live forever. But in return, sheâ€™s cursed to be forgotten by everyone she meets. That all changes 300 years later, when Addie LaRue stumbles upon a man who remembers her name.
tagline: A Life No One Will Remember. A Story You Will Never Forget.
title: The Invisible Life of Addie Larue
